extendedInfo.description: The Kona mobile app compliments all the benefits of Kona.com. Kona is an online space for any group to privately connect, organize, discuss, and get things done together. And for people involved with multiple groups, like project teams at work, volunteer organizations, membership clubs and family, Kona keeps track of everything theyâre responsible for and talking about across all spaces in one personalized place. â®â® Key Benefits: â Get Your Groups Working Together - Kona is the easy and free way for any group to privately connect, organize, discuss, and get things done together. â Kona is Social, with a Purpose - Social websites are great for keeping in touch or seeing whatâs new. Kona is social, tooâbut around a purpose. Time spent on Kona feels good AND is productive. â Kona Fits into Your Life - Finally, something that feels good to use in both your personal and work life. Whether using it on your own, with co-workers, club members, or family, Kona keeps all the important things organized in one place. â Kona is Everywhere You Are - On your smart phone, in your email, at work, at homeâKona is where you and the people in your groups want it. â®â® Key Features: â Each Kona space provides group conversations and file sharing in context of the tasks, calendar events, and purpose of the group. â All information in Kona is private to the people youâve invited to the group. â The My Kona view brings together a personalized view of the important conversations, calendar events, and tasks for each user across all their spaces. Need help? Visit the Kona Help Center: http://support.kona.com/Want to keep up with whatâs going on with Kona? Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/KonaLife Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/kona_life

reviews.title: design
reviews.comment: beautiful design but i cant minize it. it always shows when no application is active.
reviews.author: Mark Ryan Concepcion

reviews.title: Great product, but app doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t seem to function on Android 4.03. Just loads to a blank screen.
reviews.author: Jeremy Fretts

reviews.title: Loggin won\'t work
reviews.comment: Try to log in nuimerous times and each time it asks for password and user name.  Tried to reset and nothing works.  Android system
reviews.author: Michael Radke

reviews.title: Much Faster!
reviews.comment: The new Kona mobile app performs much better than the old onr. Big productivity increase!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Notifications not working & Doesn\'t work on tablet
reviews.comment: App looks great and everything else works. Just getting notifications on my Razr and it goes into an endless refreshing loop on my ASUS tablet.
reviews.author: Dan Fernandez Jr.

reviews.title: Problems in Konadise
reviews.comment: App sticks and is very slow on my Samsung Galaxy 3
reviews.author: Mark Jones

reviews.title: Much better
reviews.comment: The new app is head and shoulders above the previous iteration. Good job Kona team
reviews.author: Colin Smith

reviews.title: The task management app I\'ve been waiting for
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried a lot of apps that don\'t come close to delivering what kona does. The support team has been very responsive and open to feedback. (App not working on new phone - not sure if its not yet compatible with Jelly Bean) Update 9/21/2012. Just received update. App finally working on Jelly Bean. Gave you guys back the 5 starts you deserve!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please allow to login with Google login
reviews.comment: There is an api that allows you to allow logins with Google. Also, you might want to consider launching your service in the business market platform of Google Apps. There aren\'t any Good free ios/Web/android/Google tie in apps for free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Apparently is very buggy and unusable
reviews.comment: I was excited about this app after trying the website but it is unusable.     - The notes section when edited on the website appears as HTML in the app.     - When notes are longer than a few lines it becomes a hassle to read since scrolling is tough on a half inch block. If you accidentally touch it, the on screen keyboard will cover it. Otherwise you might accidentally delete it.     -  The ui is somewhat confusing since the top bar constantly changes.     +several other bugs.   Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Promising
reviews.comment: The service looks very promising, and the website works great. The app could definitely use some work, though. Significant lag, weird screen effects, and backing out seems to restart app. Looking forward to updates!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Constant load screen
reviews.comment: Unusable; fix and I\'ll update my review.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App does not work for Jellybean. Uninstall
reviews.comment: Fix the app...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only collaboration app I use
reviews.comment: I have just started assembling a team to launch a new online resource for Law Enforcement. This app us the only collaboration tool that we use to get the job done. Well done.
reviews.author: Brian Cain

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Helps me stay in touch and collaborate with my team. Kona, on my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kona rocks
reviews.comment: I love Kona! It has changed how I manage my tasks and time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: It\'s very useful!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: Awesome app - great functionality like the website.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: GREAT app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very slow
reviews.comment: Very slow
reviews.author: A Google User
